document_data.name: Goldenthrone
document_data.mainbody: '''Goldenthrone''' was a palace in [[Port Nyanzaru]] that served as the meeting place for the city's merchant princes as well as its seat of government. It was the prime location for those who sought an audience with the merchant princes.
document_data.Location: The palace was located in the city's [[Port Nyanzaru/Merchants' Ward|Merchants' Ward]] atop [[Throne Hill]].
document_data.Structure: The palace was one of the most luxurious buildings in all of Port Nyanzaru.{{Cite adventurers league/A City on the Edge|6}}
document_data.Defense: The merchant princes were protected by eight members of the [[Chult]]an honor guard.
document_data.History: Goldenthrone was constructed several decades before the year the [[death curse]] struck [[Faer√ªn]], at the behest of an [[Amn]]ian trader.
